content:
With that mix of activities, here's a comprehensive checklist to help you keep track of your sports gear and equipment:

**Running**

* Running shoes
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., cleaned, stored)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., replace every 300-500 miles)
	+ Notes: (e.g., mileage tracker, favorite routes)
* Socks
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., washed)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., replace every 6-12 months)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite brands, sizes)
* Water bottle/hydration pack
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., cleaned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., replace every 6-12 months)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite brands, sizes)
* Headphones/earbuds
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., cleaned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., replace every 12-18 months)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite brands, sizes)

**Cycling**

* Road bike
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., tuned, cleaned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., annual maintenance)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite routes, maintenance schedule)
* Mountain bike
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., tuned, cleaned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., annual maintenance)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite trails, maintenance schedule)
* Helmet
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., cleaned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., replace every 3-5 years)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite brands, sizes)
* Cycling shoes
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., cleaned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., replace every 12-18 months)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite brands, sizes)

**Tennis**

* Racket
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., restrung, cleaned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., restring every 3-6 months)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite strings, grip sizes)
* Balls
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., stored)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., replace every 6-12 months)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite brands, pressure levels)
* Shoes
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., cleaned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., replace every 6-12 months)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite brands, sizes)

**Skiing**

* Skis
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., waxed, tuned)
	+ Service Due: [Date] (e.g., annual maintenance)
	+ Notes: (e.g., favorite resorts, maintenance schedule)
* Boots
	+ Last Used: [Date]
	+ Last Serviced: [Date] (e.g., cleaned)
